sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../AuthContext'; import { msmeAPI } from '../api'; export default function MSMELEG() { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const [data, setData] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [showUserMenu, setShowUserMenu] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { try { const dashboardData = await msmeAPI.getDashboard(); setData(dashboardData); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to fetch data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } } fetchData(); }, []); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); }; if (loading) { return (
Loading...
); } const menuItems = [ { name: 'Dashboard', path: '/msme/dashboard', icon: 'M3 12l2-2m0 0l7-7 7 7M5 10v10a1 1 0 001 1h3m10-11l2 2m-2-2v10a1 1 0 01-1 1h-3m-6 0a1 1 0 001-1v-4a1 1 0 011-1h2a1 1 0 011 1v4a1 1 0 001 1m-6 0h6' }, { name: 'Profile', path: '/msme/profile', icon: 'M16 7a4 4 0 11-8 0 4 4 0 018 0zM12 14a7 7 0 00-7 7h14a7 7 0 00-7-7z' }, { name: 'Applications', path: '/msme/applications', icon: 'M9 12h6m-6 4h6m2 5H7a2 2 0 01-2-2V5a2 2 0 012-2h5.586a1 1 0 01.707.293l5.414 5.414a1 1 0 01.293.707V19a2 2 0 01-2 2z' }, { name: 'Local Enterprise Group', path: '/msme/leg', icon: 'M17 20h5v-2a3 3 0 00-5.356-1.857M17 20H7m10 0v-2c0-.656-.126-1.283-.356-1.857M7 20H2v-2a3 3 0 015.356-1.857M7 20v-2c0-.656.126-1.283.356-1.857m0 0a5.002 5.002 0 019.288 0M15 7a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0zm6 3a2 2 0 11-4 0 2 2 0 014 0zM7 10a2 2 0 11-4 0 2 2 0 014 0z' }, { name: 'Active Loans', path: '/msme/loans', icon: 'M3 10h18M7 15h1m4 0h1m-7 4h12a3 3 0 003-3V8a3 3 0 00-3-3H6a3 3 0 00-3 3v8a3 3 0 003 3z' } ]; return (
{/* Sidebar */}
MSME Portal
J&K MSME System
{menuItems.map((item, i) => { const isActive = window.location.pathname === item.path; return ( {item.name} ); })}
{/* Bottom Section */}
{user.businessName || user.name}
MSME Partner
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Top Header */}

{user.businessName || user.name}

{user.businessType} • {user.district}

{showUserMenu && (
Profile
)}
{/* LEG Content */}

Local Enterprise Groups

Manage your LEG memberships and create new groups

{/* What is LEG Info Box */}

What is a LEG?

Local Enterprise Groups (LEGs) enable MSMEs to collectively apply for larger credit amounts that exceed individual thresholds. Groups must have 4-50 members and a credit committee of 3-5 members.

{/* LEG List */}
{(data?.legs || []).map((leg, i) => (

{leg.name}

{leg.status} {leg.isCommittee && ( Committee Member )}

Collective of MSMEs from {leg.district} working together for better credit access

{leg.district}
{leg.members} members
3 committee members
{/* Members Section */}

Members:

{[ 'Kashmir Enterprises (Committee)', 'Jammu Enterprises (Committee)', 'Budgam Enterprises (Committee)', 'Paradise Enterprises', 'Shopian Enterprises', '+3 more' ].map((member, j) => ( {member} ))}
))}
); }
